name: TVP Street Tacos
description: TVP Tacos with a mix of TVP, mushrooms, and walnuts seasoned with a savory marinade. Served on corn tortillas with cilantro, onion and salsa. Recipe adapted from Amor y Sabor con Cesia
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Finely chopped walnuts or pecans

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse TVP in cold water. Place TVP in  large pot with 3 cups of water, lime juice, onion, and bay leaf. Simmer for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse TVP in cold water. Place TVP in  large pot with 3 cups of water, lime juice, onion, and bay leaf. Simmer for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: While the TVP is simmering place the soy sauce, garlic cloves, onion, smoked paprika, and water in the blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: While the TVP is simmering place the soy sauce, garlic cloves, onion, smoked paprika, and water in the blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain, rinse, and squeeze out all of the water possible from the TVP.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain, rinse, and squeeze out all of the water possible from the TVP.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large sauté pan to medium-high heat add 1 tbsp. of oil (optional). Add the mushrooms and cook until golden brown, about 6-8 minutes, stir often. Add the TVP and the chopped walnuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large sauté pan to medium-high heat add 1 tbsp. of oil (optional). Add the mushrooms and cook until golden brown, about 6-8 minutes, stir often. Add the TVP and the chopped walnuts.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue to cook for 3 – 4 minutes in the pan. Add the seasoning sauce and stir to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue to cook for 3 – 4 minutes in the pan. Add the seasoning sauce and stir to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until the meat is golden brown and most of the liquid has evaporated, about 4 more minutes. Adjust seasoning if necessary with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until the meat is golden brown and most of the liquid has evaporated, about 4 more minutes. Adjust seasoning if necessary with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up tortillas on a griddle or comal coated with a small amount of oil. To assemble the tacos place two tortillas on top of each other place filling in the center and sprinkle with onion and cilantro. Add a splash of lime juice, and your favorite salsa. Repeat this with the rest of the tortillas and filling.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat up tortillas on a griddle or comal coated with a small amount of oil. To assemble the tacos place two tortillas on top of each other place filling in the center and sprinkle with onion and cilantro. Add a splash of lime juice, and your favorite salsa. Repeat this with the rest of the tortillas and filling.

keywords: corn tortillas, mole and mushrooms, vegan tacos, walnuts
